Package com.viaoa.jfc.control

Controllers for Swing UI components so that they can use binding with OAModels.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AutoCompleteTextFieldController
    Controller OAAutoComplete.
    ButtonController
    Functionality for binding JButton to OA.
    ComboBoxController
    Functionality for binding JComboBox to OA.
    CustomComboBoxController
    Functionality for binding a custom JComboBox to OA.
    CutCopyPasteController
    Creates system wide cut/copy/paste (c/c/p) components, that listen to focus component for c/c/p changes.
    DateChooserController
    Works directly with OADateChooser for binding an calendar component to an object property.
    EnabledController Deprecated
    use OAObjectChangeListener instead
    FormattedTextFieldController
    Functionality for binding OAFormattedTextField to OA.
    HTMLTextPaneController
    class for binding Editor to Object or Hub.
    Hub2TextFieldFilter
    Used for binding a JTextField component to perform filter on a Hub.
    Hub2TextFieldLookup
    Used for binding a JTextField component to perform a select on a Hub.
    Hub2TreeNode
    Used by OATreeNodeData for each node in the tree that uses a Hub.
    LabelController
    Controller for binding OA to JLabel.
    ListController
    Controller for binding OA to JList.
    OAExceptionDialog
    Dialog box that works directly with OAExceptions to display dialog when an exception is created.
    OAJfcController
    Base controller class for OA JFC/Swing components.
    OAJfcControllerFactory
    factory methods for OAJfcController.
    OATreeTableController
    Creates a Tree to use as a column in a Table.
    TabbedPaneController
    creates an Keylistener (ctrl+down) to toggle tab layout policy, popup menu to select tab layout policy.
    TextAreaController
    Controller for binding OA to JTextArea.
    TextFieldController
    Controller for binding OA to JTextField.
    ToggleButtonController
    Controller for binding OA to AbstratButton.
    UndoableController
    Works with OAUndoManager, supplies UI components with undo/redo functionality.
    VisibleController Deprecated
    use OAObjectChangeListener instead

Package com.viaoa.jfc.control Description

Controllers for Swing UI components so that they can use binding with OAModels.
